usp.intro: Enhance your club homepage with results, games and rankings!
usp.updatedContent: Information updated daily from Swiss Volley API.
usp.automatedContent: No manual action required after initial setup.
usp.simpleContent: Developed with the end user in mind. Little complexity, easy integration, good support.

demo.intro: These tables are designed to work on different sizes of devices without losing relevant data. See how different sizes are handled by resizing the box below.
demo.resize: Drag the left or right border of the box to resize.
